Module org.example.miniproyecto_3
Package org.example.miniproyecto_3.Controller

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
org.example.miniproyecto_3.Controller.HomeController
public class HomeController extends Object
Controller class for the home screen of the Battleship game.

Handles user interaction on the home view, such as starting a new game, continuing a saved one, or exiting the application. Also manages nickname input and visual UI effects.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller once the FXML elements are loaded. Sets up button actions, UI effects, and loads the file handler.

    • applyFadeEffect

      private void applyFadeEffect(Button btn)
      Applies a fade animation and hover effect to a button.
      Parameters:
      btn - the button to apply the effect to

    • handleStart

      private void handleStart()
      Handles the logic when the user presses the "Start" button. Saves the entered nickname and transitions to the game screen.

    • hasSavedGame

      private boolean hasSavedGame()
      Checks whether there is a saved game file available.
      Returns:
      true if a save file exists, false otherwise

    • handleContinue

      private void handleContinue()
      Handles the logic when the user presses the "Continue" button. Loads the game view with the previous game state.

    • loadGameView

      private void loadGameView(Boolean continueGame)
      Loads the game scene (GameView.fxml) and passes control to the game controller.
      Parameters:
      continueGame - true if resuming a saved game, false if starting new
